children.text:
1.4.0 - 2016-12-14
•  Minor bug fixes
•  Updated help, Language and FAQ pages.
•  New Sample: Calculator.

Visit the blog at scriptit-app.com to learn about an upcoming release, programming, the ScriptIt API, permissions etc.

1.3.9 - 2016-09-14
•  Bug fixes: find/replace text, toggle comment and reported crashes.

1.3.8 - 2016-09-02
•  Android TV Support: Keyboard shortcuts for all menu commands.

1.3.7 - 2016-08-24
•  Bug fixes: Paste and Go to Line.

1.3.6 - 2016-07-01
•  Minor bug fixes

1.3.5 - 2016-06-22
•  Editor, select line.
•  Bug fixes.
•  New Samples: AudioInfo, Battery, BluetoothToggle, Brightness, BuildInfo, HeadphoneMusic, SendEmail, Wait, WifiToggle and WhereAmI.

1.3.4 - 2016-06-08
•  Added choice and multipleChoice commands.
•  Updated help, Language and FAQ pages.
•  New Sample: Survey.

1.3.3 - 2016-05-22
•  Shortcuts revised, see blog.
•  New Samples: PlayBuck, PlayRadio

1.3.2 - 2016-05-15
•  New events: onKeyDown, onKeyUp, onKeyLongPress and onBackPressed.
•  New Samples: KeyEvents, BackQuick, BackTwice and InstalledApps
•  Minor changes and bug fixes.

1.3.1 - 2016-04-25
•  Upgraded to Rhino JavaScript Engine v1.7.7+ and running in 200 mode.
•  Added alert, confirm and prompt commands.
•  New Sample: Interact demos alert, confirm and prompt commands.
•  Updated help, Language and FAQ pages.

1.3.0 - 2015-08-20
•  Upgraded to Newest Rhino JavaScript Engine v1.7R6 and running in 180 mode.
•  New Setting : Show Console - if a script prints to the console, at exit show the console. 
•  Toggle Comment - comment/uncomment selection.
•  New Samples: FileList, Director, WifiAnnouce ...

1.2.9 - 2014-12-13
•  KitKat, Lollipop and Language bindings.

1.2.8 - 2014-09-19
•  Continued editor optimizations.
•  Bug fixes: Sony Xperia keyboard 

1.2.7 - 2014-07-13
•  Minor bug fixes.
•  New Samples: Ip, PhoneNumber and Notification

1.2.6 - 2014-06-01
•  Editor optimizations.
•  New Bluetooth sample

1.2.5 - 2014-05-18
•  New templates ListAdapter and ExpandableAdapter.
•  More snippets, layouts and tips.
•  Bug fixes: paste, line number.
•  Editor optimizations for loading, scrolling, syntax highlighting, soft keyboard, and menus.
•  Backup and Restore moved to file menu.

1.2.4 - 2014-04-02
•  Support for smaller devices.
•  More Samples like: AudioPlay, Dialer, SendSms and Speak

1.2.3 - 2014-03-20
•  Editor cache now remembers last modfied date.
•  If original file changes external to ScriptIt, the user is notified and the file can be reloaded.
•  Splash screen displayed while IDE loads in background.
•  All dialogs can be dismissed by clicking outside of them.
•  More Samples like: TicTacToe.

1.2.2 - 2014-02-23
•  New templates reorganized into themed expandable sections, more templates.
•  New Copy-Project creates a new project from existing project.
•  Settings to purge Tmp (temporary) directory. Also sample and template scripts write output to Tmp directory.
•  More templates, snippets, sample scripts, layouts and tips.

1.2.1 - 2014-02-01
•  Snippets reorganized into themed expandable sections with more logic snippets and reworked to cohesively function together.
•  More sample scripts like Self which shows how to pass information to an activity.

1.2.0 - 2014-01-10
•  Application setting to toggle between light and dark themes.
•  Transparent Find dialog setting makes whole screen viewable.
•  Minor reorganization of Settings.

1.1.9 - 2013-12-30
•  Beta JavaScript syntax highlighting
•  Project directories to support backup and restore.
•  Layout resource Ids have changed. Please reselect affected script layouts to fix.

1.1.8 - 2013-12-21
•  Backup Directory to zip archive
•  Restore Directory from zip archive
•  Filesystem Sandbox setting restricts open and save operations.
•  Tips, how to better use this product

1.1.7 - 2013-12-02
•  Beta Layout uses layout resources and binds widgets to JavaScript variables.
•  New template login
•  Minor template and snippet changes.

1.1.6 - 2013-10-26
•  New templates, splash and worker
•  New global data storage
•  New Samples Global, HasTelephony and IsWifiConnected New Snippets pickImage, doWorkInBackground, and more.
•  More updates to help pages.

1.1.5 - 2013-08-23
•  Select block, beginning of line, end of line, next and previous function navigation.
•  Updated help, Language and FAQ pages.
•  Minor bug fixes.

1.1.4 - 2013-06-30
•  Added print command.
•  Added Console to view print output.
•  From Settings, restore important files.
•  Load command of modules.
•  New samples: SimpleActivity uses load command, HelloWorld.

1.1.3 - 2013-06-23
•  Final Log viewer. •  New samples: JustLog and JsonTest.

1.1.2 - 2013-05-10
•  Beta Log viewer
•  Indent/Undent selection
•  New Sample: Map demonstrates Google maps JavaScript V3 in a WebView Container

1.1.1 - 2013-04-15
•  Minor bug fixes

1.1.0 - 2013-03-30
•  Upgraded to Newest Rhino JavaScript Engine v1.7R4 and running in 1.8 mode
•  Samples and Templates reworked
•  More Snippets
•  New JsUrl I/O class
•  Editor, delete line
•  File, create shortcut
•  More Samples: PickImage, XmlPullParser and Url_IO

1.0.10 - 2013-03-01
•  Final Undo/Redo
•  Local help and FAQ pages

1.0.9 - 2013-02-16 Navigation Menu Added
•  Beginning of file
•  End of File
•  Go to Line
•  Go to Function
•  Matching Brace
•  Go to Error

1.0.8 - 2013-02-04 Beta Undo/Redo

1.0.7 - 2013-01-11 More sample scripts.
•  Contacts - reads contacts list
•  SendText - send SMS text message
•  Vibrate - vibrate pattern
•  AudioRecorder - recorder
•  Versions - Android API version

1.0.6 - 2013-01-2 Editor bug fixes.

1.0.5 - 2013-01-1 Initial release.

If you have any feedback feel free to contact me and I hope you enjoy this release,

Rob Bowman
rbowmanllc@gmail.com
